name: HELLSTORE
description:
HELLSTORE is an exciting tower defense game. Your objective is to defeat all the enemies before they reach your base. To achieve the best results, strategically place your towers. Each enemy defeated provides income for upgrading and building new towers. Test yourself to see how many waves of enemies you can handle.

Good Luck!

Controls Mouse to Build, Upgrade and Sell Towers

Composer: BloodPixelHero
2d artist: drummyfish from OGA
